We promise â itâs worth it! **Agent Squeak *is* SPY mouse, a super-secret operative serving the needs of mice everywhere.Can the world's smallest hero prevail in one of mobileâs biggest games? His fate's in your hands!â Sneak, scamper and snack your way through 70+ deviously challenging levels!â 6 unique worlds, full of adventure, each with their own diabolical hench-cat to outwit.â Run circles around your feline foes using all manner of zany gadgets, gizmos and power-ups!â Forever fun with achievements, secret levels and thrilling, action-packed updates!Slip into the astounding world of SPY mouse and find out how deep the mouse hole goes...Be the first to know! reviews.title: Had to re-install before it worked.
reviews.comment: Installed fine, but then I had to download 100mb of content. When its done it says its not licensed for my device. Uninstalled it. Re-installed it a few days later, downloaded the content, it works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MAN
reviews.comment: It doesnt work... It comes to checking license and stops and screen goes blank... Word of advice... Make it for 1.5 and above... This way it wkrks on everything and you make money!
reviews.author: antoine anderson

reviews.title: Runs fine, but clogs photo gallery
reviews.comment: The game runs fine on my Galaxy tablet, and it\'s fun, however, my gallery is now.full of thousands of images of the game. This means once I\'m done playing I will uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What, no refund option?
reviews.comment: So I download it, (3 times cos the download kept crashing,) only to read message that says *the licence isn\'t valid on my device* wtf is that, and where\'s my refund!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Game doesn\'t work properly on my ASUS Transformer. Paid and downloaded but it said I needed to download 300 mb more content before playing. Download stopped at 96% every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Takes forever to install
reviews.comment: After installing you need an additional 140MB download which takes more than the 15 minutes you have to try it out before you can refund the purchase. I gave up after 25 minutes of trying. Lesson learned.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but....
reviews.comment: This is a great game but when I try to go to the next level in some instances, I get an fc and have to restart the game. :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Derp
reviews.comment: Really EA? We expect a higher level of quality from you.  Doesn\'t work on HTC EVO LTE and the app needs 300 MB of free space to operate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes consantly
reviews.comment: Crashes every 3 minutes. Game is fan when it works. When the game is fixed I\'ll give more stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Fun
reviews.comment: Thought it was cheesy at first, but it more then squeaked by. Seriously this game is addictive and fun. Mousing around was never more clever
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun.
reviews.comment: No problems at all. Don\'t have any of the issues many mention.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fine to me!
reviews.comment: Runs fine on my galaxy nexus and my nexus 7 both rooted Codename Android, still have the refund button, they can\'t help it if your connection is slow, also I am glad I never bought a transformer they are always on these reviews saying the don\'t work for most people. Also drm, turned off wifi on my Nexus 7 and it plays just fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but after few Months app can\'t find.
reviews.comment: I have purchase this app few months ago. But now I can\'t find it with play store app. Therefore I have to use web browser to tee download.
reviews.author: Chathuranga Bandara Udagama

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: Fun and addictive. I like the objectives on each level. Adds a little replay value to try to beat everything. Slightly difficult but not too bad. Galaxy Nexus with JB.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My new jam
reviews.comment: Love the game and its one of my favorites but why are there 2 versions of this game?!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This suck
reviews.comment: I want my money back first off i download it on my tmobile exhibit 2 then it says something about a 300mb download tryed that it dont work how the hell it say free space when i have 14gb of free space this is a rip off. 0 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t currently work!
reviews.comment: Despite the reviews regarding usability on HTC One S...  I only paid a quarter, so this won\'t be a huge disaster I\'d it never for a work.  I will gladly change my 1 star reading accordingly  if/when EA fixes it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Got for .25 license check fails
reviews.comment: Finally got lic to work by opening Google play then go into game.. but game is so heavy and runs so slow its a joke.. maybe after an update.. License check fails every time galaxy s T-Mobile.. i think I over paid!! App closes can\'t play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun games
reviews.comment: Finally able to finish downloaded the additional 300 mb file. My wife plays it and she simply love it. So beside the trouble in the beginning, this is a good fun game and totally worth it. But the total levels is kinda short. Need additional levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s OK.
reviews.comment: There are very few levels I didn\'t clear in the first try.  I kept waiting for it to get better and then...boom!  It\'s over.  :/ I\'m very glad I only paid a quarter for this game, not worth much more.
reviews.author: A Google User
